DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation heat therapy machine could reduce dysmenorrhea woman primary secondary dysmenorrhea .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Sham Device Controlled , Single Blinded Trial Portable Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation Heat Therapy Machine Women With Dysmenorrhea
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion/Exclusion : Described Eligibility section . Outcome measure : Change VAS score use TENS heat therapy machine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Age > 19 Premenopausal Moderate severe dysmenorrhea , mainly low abdomen area Exclusion Pregnant Surgery history low abdomen Recent history cancer TENS device use contraindicate Ibuprofen use contraindicate
